document_data.name: Bruno Indomicus
document_data.mainbody:
'''Bruno Indomicus''' was an indentured employee of the [[Blushing Mermaid]] in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|I've seen some dark shit at the 'Maid - but I ain't never seen anything like them monsters. Thank you for taking 'em down.|Bruno Indomicus}}
document_data.Description: Bruno was a [[gold dwarf]] with a dark brown skin tone, dark brown hair, and blue eyes. He kept his scalp and face clean-shaven.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the time [[Captain Grisly]] was replaced by the [[green hag]] [[Auntie Ethel]] as the owner of the Blushing Mermaid. During that time, Bruno Indomicus found himself in debt to the establishment, unable to pay. Captain Grisly and Bosun [[Gannet]] put the dwarf to work on sorting produce for the tavern's kitchen until Bruno's debt was fully paid off. Bruno was also a gambler and owed [[Baldur's Bones]] money to [[Brinks]], a criminal element of the Lower City. Brinks demanded Bosun Gannet chop Bruno's finger off as a warning, but the innkeeper turned the request down, offering instead to buy the dwarf's debt out.
